name: Xoters
description:
Xoters is a 2011 arena shooter game made for a Tigsource jam.

Keys used in the game are up and down arrows, A (player 1) and L (player 2).
The game is playable to the end but lacks opening and ending cutscenes.

Get speedup items, fly through enemies to deplete their HP and then finish
them with a shot once they're at zero shield.

The MMF2 source file is included.

Loosely based on Serpent for the Game Boy, if I recall.
